=== File .xbmc/userdata/addon_data/script-video-ripper/progress/progress ===
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * Progress from 0-101. This value will be used to display progress-bar inside the gui 
 * Valid Values : 0-101 
 * Only integer-values are allowed ... no float-values or % 
   0 .. 100  this will be shown as %
   101       this stage doesn't have a progress-bar 
 * Example 

{{{
87
}}}
